name: AI Express
description: A simple express template to rapidly publish API endpoints based on prompts to Open AI models.

PAYLOAD_PUBLIC_AIEXPRESS_API_KEY.description: A unique secret key for accessing your AI Express server.

MONGODB_URI.description: Your MongoDB connection URI with username and password.
